content: > use these codes to save when you buy > multiple patterns > - saveon3 to save 10% off 3 patterns > - saveon5 to save 15% off 5 patterns > - saveon8 to save 20% off 8 patterns > > add all patterns to cart for discount > limit one use per purchase what s cuter than a baby penguin two baby penguins see how one crochet pattern can make 2 completely different yet equally adorable penguins one of the penguins uses scarfie and the other uses babysoft boucle head over to the blog post to read about the differences in each toy and get the free pattern or purchase the pdf for easy printing
